title: BOSS Audio BV9695B
description: BOSS Audio Systems BV9695B Car Audio Stereo System - 6.95 Inch Double Din, Touchscreen, Bluetooth Audio and Calling Head Unit, CD Player, A-Link (Screen Mirroring), AM/FM Radio Receiver, For Amplifier Car DVD Player - A-Link (Screen Mirroring), Double Din, 6.95" LCD Touchscreen, Bluetooth, DVD, CD, USB, SD, Aux and AV in, AM/FM Max out your music with the BOSS Audio Systems BV9695B In-Dash Double-DIN DVD Player with a 6.95 inch Touchscreen Monitor. Screen mirroring supports Android phones. Play music and video via the DVD/CD player, pop in a USB or SD, or connect to your smartphone via the Auxiliary input. Bluetooth technology lets you stream music and make calls hands-free. Change colors with Multi-Color Illumination, and style the sound with the built-in Preset EQ.

title: BOSS Audio BCPA9690RC
description: OSS Audio Systems BCPA9690RC Car Audio Stereo System - Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, 6.75 Inch Double-Din, Touchscreen, Bluetooth Head Unit, Backup Camera, Radio Receiver, CD Player, For Amplifier Apple CarPlay, Android Auto Car DVD Player, Rearview Camera, Double-Din, 6.75" LCD Touchscreen, Bluetooth, RGB Illumination, USB, AM/FM Radio Choose Apple and third-party iOS apps as well as Android Auto to link to the Apple CarPlay built right into the BCPA9690RC double-din car multimedia Head Unit. You will be able to easily select CarPlay related icons as well as all other system settings and configurations with the big 6.75-inch capacitive touchscreen monitor. Siri voice controls assists you with directions, looks for points of interest, checks your messages / replies to them, plays music and more. Hook your Smartphone or MP3 player up to the auxiliary input, tune into your favorite AM/FM radio station, or plug into the USB port for more choices in music. You can charge USB devices with the USB port. Bluetooth technology lets you play and control music apps and make calls hands-free. Control it all with the wireless remote control, existing steering wheel controls or the touchscreen.

title: Dual Electronics DCPA71W
description: The Dual DCPA71W 7-inch Double-DIN In-Dash Digital Media Receiver will make any drive more enjoyable. The receiver is compatible with Apple Car Play and Android Auto with both wireless or wired connections. The 7-inch Extra-large LED backlit touchscreen maximizes your driving experience. The large display is easy to navigate and makes managing your music and apps effortless and convenient. Designed to fit most Double DIN dash openings (4" x 7") this receiver brings a next-generation infotainment experience to your current vehicle. Inputs also include a rear USB with 1.5 Amp fast charging for most devices, rear RCA backup camera input, a 3.5mm front panel AUX input , and has a steering wheel control input (compatible with most SWC Interfaces, not included, sold separately).

title: Power Acoustik CPAA-70D
description: Don't pick your aftermarket head unit based on the kind of phone you have. The Power Acoustik CPAA-70D 7‚Äù Double DIN In-Dash DVD Receiver has both Apple CarPlay and Android Auto. Now you can keep your eyes on the road and not on your phone. Use apps, your phone's voice assistant, make calls, look at maps, and more. This car stereo receiver also has a 3.5 mm aux input, USB input, a microSD Card slot, and a backup camera input and a front camera input.
